title: Mouse Button 4 won't work with League.
body:
But it used to! I can use it fine on the browser and other games (I go back a page on the browser as intended), but League's stopped recognising the button exists, which is a shame as I use it a lot as a hotkey.

I can't keybind it either anymore.

Any assistance would be greatly appreciated, I just don't know what's going wrong.

replies.body: If you have Windows 10 creators Update, [Microsoft made a boo-boo](https://twitter.com/HoodedDemonLP/status/868055100098478082) that I don't know when they'll fix. Yes, this goes to a twitter exchange between myself and some other people, but the answer (for me) is that warframe link.

Have you tried changing the keybind suggested here ?https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2NoAhIXP-solution-to-mb4mb5-not-working-in-windows-creators-update 

It worked for me
Having a similar issue with Mouse 3 and Mouse 4. Going to repair now. I'll see if that works.
Are you on the Windows 10 Creator update?  Some of these mouse buttons stopped working, so it may be necessary to roll the version back in the meantime.  Let me know if that's the case for you.

Yes, I did recently update my Windows 10. That explains a lot.

I'll leave my Windows 10 version as-is, though. You're probably working on a fix anyway. :-)

bump, won't play until it's fixed. I tried the fixes suggested in other threads, but the keys are simply not recognized by the client/game. 
Muscle memory OP.
